summary: GPT-6 very unlikely before May 2026. GPT-5.2 just released Dec 2025. OpenAI confirmed no GPT-6 in 2025. Speculation points to mid-late 2026 at earliest.
content:
Key findings:
- GPT-5 released Aug 2025, GPT-5.1 Nov 2025, GPT-5.2 Dec 2025 (updated Jan 2026)
- OpenAI officially confirmed GPT-6 not shipping in 2025 (Oct 2025)
- Sam Altman: wait for GPT-6 shorter than GPT-4â†’GPT-5 gap (~2 years)
- Hardware for next-gen: deliveries in H2 2026
- Speculation: private previews mid-2026, public release late 2026/early 2027
- Manifold "GPT-6 before June 1 2026" at 16.6%
- Manifold "GPT-6 in 2026" at 76.3%
- No official GPT-6 announcement or release date as of Jan 2026
- Microsoft Maia 200 chip announced Jan 2026 to power GPT-5.2 (not GPT-6)
